definition: Nikolai Ostrovsky (1904-1936), Soviet socialist realist writer/Alexander Ostrovsky (1823-1886), Russian playwright
pinyin: Ao4 si1 te4 luo4 fu1 si1 ji1

definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Ostrovsky departed from us already seventy whole years.
sentences.chinese: 奧斯特洛夫斯基離開我們已經整整七十年了。

sentences.english: The author Ostrovsky was born in a worker’s family.
sentences.chinese: 作家奧斯特洛夫斯基生於一個工人家庭。
